statements: SELECT * FROM customer_info;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_info;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT first_name, phone_number FROM customer_info ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_info WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE last_name = 'Doe' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customer_info WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_info WHERE last_name = 'Smith' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_price > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_price FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' OR first_name = 'Jane';
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC

SELECT customers.customer_id, customers.first_name, purchase_history.product_id, purchase_history.purchase_date FROM customers INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id

SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, product_preferences.product_type, product_preferences.preference_score FROM customers INNER JOIN product_preferences ON customers.customer_id = product_preferences.customer_id
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customer WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM Customer JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, product_name, category FROM Customer JOIN Preferences ON Customer.customer_id = Preferences.customer_id JOIN Product ON Product.product_id = Preferences.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM Customer LEFT JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id GROUP BY Customer.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_date, total_amount FROM Customer JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, category, preference_score FROM Preferences WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM Recommendations WHERE customer_id = 2002 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, order_date, total_amount FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, category, preference_score FROM Customers INNER JOIN Preferences ON Customers.customer_id = Preferences.customer_id WHERE Preferences.preference_score > 5;
